title: Create video for checking detection differed from refining tracklets

labels.name: howtousedlc
labels.description: issue regarding the use of DeepLabCut

body:
### Is there an existing issue for this?

- [X] I have searched the existing issues

### Bug description

Hi

I am working on pose estimation on Marmosets using ma-DLC. I have an issue where plotted points on refining tracklets are way too different compare to the create video for checking detection. Major plotted points' swap between male and female marmosets were occurred along the refining tracklets. Some even mixed wrongly for the body parts but created video for checking detection was fine. How can I fixed them without refining them one by one throughout frames in tracklets? This is my config.yaml and inference_config.yaml. Please help.

### Operating System

Windows 10

### DeepLabCut version

2.2rc3

### DeepLabCut mode

multi animal

### Device type

GeForce GTX 1060

### Steps To Reproduce

_No response_

### Relevant log output

```shell
CONFIG.YAML

# Project definitions (do not edit)
Task: '00001'
scorer: adam
date: Jan5
multianimalproject: true
identity: false

    # Project path (change when moving around)
project_path: C:\Users\adam\00001-adam-2022-01-05

    # Annotation data set configuration (and individual video cropping parameters)
video_sets:
  C:\Users\adam\00001-adam-2022-01-05\videos\00001.mp4:
    crop: 657, 1261, 11, 1079
individuals:
- male
- female
uniquebodyparts:
- testis
multianimalbodyparts:
- rightear
- forehead
- leftear
- chin
- chest
- tail1
- tail2
- tail3
- tail4
- tail5
skeleton:
- - rightear
  - forehead
- - forehead
  - leftear
- - chin
  - chest
- - tail2
  - tail3
- - chest
  - tail1
- - tail4
  - tail5
- - tail1
  - tail2
- - forehead
  - chin
- - tail3
  - tail4
bodyparts: MULTI!
start: 0
stop: 1
numframes2pick: 20

    # Plotting configuration
skeleton_color: yellow
pcutoff: 0.6
dotsize: 12
alphavalue: 0.7
colormap: rainbow

    # Training,Evaluation and Analysis configuration
TrainingFraction:
- 0.95
iteration: 0
default_net_type: resnet_50
default_augmenter: multi-animal-imgaug
snapshotindex: -1
batch_size: 4

    # Cropping Parameters (for analysis and outlier frame detection)
cropping: false
    #if cropping is true for analysis, then set the values here:
x1: 0
x2: 640
y1: 277
y2: 624

    # Refinement configuration (parameters from annotation dataset configuration also relevant in this stage)
corner2move2:
- 50
- 50
move2corner: true


INFERENCES CONFIG.YAML

boundingboxslack: 0
iou_threshold: 0.6
max_age: 1
method: m1
min_hits: 1
minimalnumberofconnections: 5
pafthreshold: 0.1
pcutoff: 0.1
topktoretain: 2
variant: 0
withid: false
```


### Anything else?

_No response_
